0: AN ACT INCREASING PENALTIES FOR EMPLOYERS WHICH FAILS TO REMIT SSS CONTRIBUTIONS OF THEIR EMPLOYEES AMENDING PARAGRAPH (h), SECTION 28 OF REPUBLIC ACT 8282, AS AMENDED OTHERWISE KNOWN AS THE "SOCIAL SECURITY LAW" FOR THAT PURPOSE
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB04735
FULL TITLE : AN ACT INCREASING PENALTIES FOR EMPLOYERS WHICH FAILS TO REMIT SSS CONTRIBUTIONS OF THEIR EMPLOYEES AMENDING PARAGRAPH (h), SECTION 28 OF REPUBLIC ACT 8282, AS AMENDED OTHERWISE KNOWN AS THE "SOCIAL SECURITY LAW" FOR THAT PURPOSE
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : ZARATE, CARLOS ISAGANI T.
DATE FILED : 2017-01-12
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
CO-AUTHORS (Journal Entries) :
1. Sy-Alvarado (066 2017-02-06)2. Bravo (M.) (074 2017-02-22)
3. Nieto (078 2017-03-06)
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE
COMMITEE HEARINGS/ACTIONS:
      1. Committee Report filed on 2016-10-19
          -Committee Report # 16. Deliberation on this measure not pursued as it is deemed consolidated with ComRep 16 rationalizing the operations of SSS
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON GOVERNMENT ENTERPRISES AND PRIVATIZATION ON 2017-01-18
